tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

DelayMechanism.description: End to end delay detection or peer to peer delay detection. Valid values: `E2E`, `P2P`.

Interface.description: PTP slave will reply through this interface.

Mode.description: Multicast transmission or hybrid transmission. Valid values: `multicast`, `hybrid`.

RequestInterval.description: The delay request value is the logarithmic mean interval in seconds between the delay request messages sent by the slave to the master.

Status.description: Enable/disable setting the FortiGate system time by synchronizing with an PTP Server. Valid values: `enable`, `disable`.

Vdomparam.description: Specifies the vdom to which the resource will be applied when the FortiGate unit is running in VDOM mode. Only one vdom can be specified. If you want to inherit the vdom configuration of the provider, please do not set this parameter.
